page.title: 18SUNDAYS IN FLEETWOOD
page.content: On Sundays I rise at 7.30 a.m. I wake my brother and we go down for breakfast which consists of cornflakes toast & butter and coffee. We must then tidy up and wash the breakfast pots. When this is finished we get ready for Church, Mass starts at 10.00 a.m. and finishes at approximately 11.00 a.m. When we return I tidy my room which is usually very messy. After this we go for a ride in the country which I enjoy because I like to see the wildlife, I especially like rabbits.Occasionally we stop for lunch at a restaurant called "Carriages" in Blackpool. At about 2.30 p.m. we visit my grandmother for coffee. We usually have a quiet night indoors while my Dad goes to the pub for a drink.Before bed we usually watch television and have a quick drink of hot chocolate. By Heidi Rodgers, age 12.
